pageContext.claim: “Another Fake Book by two third rate Washington Post reporters, has already proven to be inaccurately reported, to their great embarrassment, all for the purpose of demeaning and belittling a President who is getting great things done for our Country, at a record clip. Thank you!”
pageContext.analysis: "A Very Stable Genius," by Philip Rucker and Carol Leonnig, has received rave reviews for its level of detail and insights into the Trump presidency. No "proof" has emerged to suggest it was inaccurately reported. Trump calls the reporters "third-rate," but they have both won Pulitzer Prizes.
